thread.title: MusicNews | James Bay and more announced to perform live at the MTV EMAs later this month
thread.title_full: MusicNews | James Bay and more announced to perform live at the MTV EMAs later this month - entertainment.ie

author: Lauren Murphy
title: MusicNews | James Bay and more announced to perform live at the MTV EMAs later this month
text:
One of the biggest events on the European music calendar takes place at the end of this month, and more live performers have just been added to the bill.
Milan will host the MTV European Music Awards on October 25th , with Ed Sheeran hosting, alongside actress Ruby Rose .
Previously announced performers include Pharrell, Ellie Goulding, Ed Sheeran, Rudimental, Twenty One Pilots and Jason Derulo.
Now, James Bay, Jess Glynne and American newcomer Tori Kelly have also been added to the line-up, while award presenters will include Mark Ronson, Fifth Harmony and Ashley Benson (Pretty Little Liars ).
The show will be broadcast live on the night on MTV from 9pm.
MORE: Watch: Ed Sheeran joins James Bay on stage to duet on his song 'Let It Go'
MORE: Ed Sheeran has a role in gory TV series 'The Bastard Executioner' - watch a clip here
MORE: Watch: Ed Sheeran sings 'Ain't No Sunshine' on The Late Show with Stephen Colbert
